articles.title: Premier League returns! Previewing Arsenal v West Ham, Spurs, Salah, Jones and Lopetegui - Football365
articles.description: The Premier League is back and we're all trying to remember what was happening before we all got distracted by the problematic shiny thing.
articles.content:
The Premier League is back and we’re all trying to remember what was happening before we all got distracted by the problematic shiny thing. Arsenal are top! Madness.
